participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and imaginative, loves storytelling and adventures.
participant_1.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i am in the third grade.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: playful and creative, enjoys daydreaming and exploring new ideas.
participant_2.background: i'm a little girl. i've superpowers. i like to make time stop. i live in the cloud.

content.text: Hey! Are you in the third grade? Because I am.
Hey! No, I'm not, but I am little too
I am a high school student
Do you have superpowers, like me?
I do not know how to draw.
ha! How old are and your sister?
I don't have one. Where do you live? In the cloud?
I live in the us. I live in the us.
But I live in the cloud
I live in the isn'thing in the world.
I want to stop time now, because we have such interesting conversation
